thread.section_title: Premier Inn London Waterloo (Westminster Bridge) Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Very good value
thread.title_full: Very good value - Review of Premier Inn London Waterloo (Westminster Bridge) Hotel, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: sarahmannPeacehaven
title: Very good value
text: This is a great location. Very good value for money. Comfy bed and nice shower. Basic but clean and tidy - perfect for someone who is not going to spend much time in their room apart from sleeping. Breakfast good but there is a different price for Continental and cooked - I think they should combine this otherwise if you just want a boiled egg you pay a premium for it...
